item.title: 编码风格
item.description: ESLint ESLint is a tool for identifying and reporting on patterns found in ECMAScript/JavaScript code, with the goal of making code more consistent and avoiding bugs. 以下风格都会尽量补充对应的 eslint 规则（如果有且被我发现的话 😑 Notice: 请优先以团队约定为准!!! 缩进
